title: Apricot Jam
directions: Wash jars in warm soapy water. Sterilise by your chosen method.
Weigh into 1000gm of apricot halves. Add 500-700gm of sugar (to taste). Chop for 10 seconds on Speed 9
Add juice of one lemon, mix for 5 seconds on Speed 5
Cook for 40-60 mins on Varoma temp, Speed 3, with rice basket on top of the lid (no MC) or until setting point is reached.
Pour hot jam into sterile jars, put lid on and tighten, turn jars over to cool upside down
ingredients: several glass jars, preferably with metal lids
